thread.title: "10 + 10 dual offer" - ChannelLive (ChannelLive TV)

title: "10 + 10 dual offer" - ChannelLive (ChannelLive TV)
text: By ChannelLive TV Oct 15, 2015 ChannelLive is the destination for regional online entertainment, stream it on your Smart TV, view on the go on your smartphones or watch uninterrupted on your computers. The 10 + 10 dual offer is a sweet deal for first time Channel LIVE subscribers, here you will get a guaranteed 10% discount on signing up and an additional 10% off if you are referring your friends or family. But this is a limited period offer and only available for a short time. Existing customers too can avail this offer and get 10% discount if you can refer your friends or family to Channel LIVE. The 10 + 10 Dual referral offer is now available only for Tamil and Telugu packages. Enjoy the best of Tamil and Telugu entertainment in High Definition quality at discounted prices. Get great deals on monthly, half yearly and annual packages. The Tamil Pack is available at $ 27.99/Month, $ 139.95/6 Months and $ 279.90/12 Months. The Telugu pack is up for grabs at $27.91/Month, $148.89/6 Months, $ 239.65/12 Months. This is a limited period offer available for a short time so grab the opportunity and subscribe today, the bigger the package the greater the discounts. Channel LIVE is an extremely versatile TV viewing service capable of streaming on multiple media devices including Smart TVs, IOS, Android devices and much more. It features Chromecast control and can be freely enabled on any suitable device at no additional cost. With High definition visuals, brilliant colors, excellent audio, on demand latest blockbusters and your favorite regional channels 24/7 Channel LIVE is a must have TV viewing service for yourself and for your entire family. And when quality entertainment in Tamil and Telugu comes at an unbeatable cost why go anywhere else, Channel LIVE is your one stop entertainment hub for the entire family. Subscribe now and enjoy high quality ad free TV without interruptions.Channel LIVE brings you the best of Tamil and Telugu entertainment with the most popular in demand regional channels. Tamil Pack:Sun TV, Star Vijay TV, Sun Music, Jaya TV, Aditya, Polimer, Podhigai, Sathiyam TV, Mtunes, Angel TV, Sri Sankara, K4U Movies, Peppers TV and News7 Channel.Telugu Pack:Gemini TV, Maa TV, TV5, Studio N, Gemini Movies, Maa Movies, Maa Music, Gemini Comedy, Maa Gold, K4U Movies and M Tunes.So what are you waiting for sign up today and avail these amazing discounts to view quality Tamil and Telugu TV entertainment online and on the go.
